comment:
/**
 * A helper class for managing and getting information about CMS users
 *
 * @memberof HashBrown.Server.Helpers
 */
classdesc: A helper class for managing and getting information about CMS users
name: UserHelper

comment:
/**
     * Sends a welcome message
     *
     * @param {String} email
     * @param {String} project
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Promise
     */
name: invite

comment:
/**
     * Finds a User by username
     *  
     * @param {String} username
     *
     * @returns {Promise(User)} user
     */
name: findUser

comment:
/**
     * Revokes all User tokens
     *
     * @returns {Promise} promise
     */
name: revokeTokens

comment:
/**
     * Logs in a User
     *
     * @param {String} username
     * @param {String} password
     * @param {Boolean} persist
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Token
     */
name: loginUser

comment:
/**
     * Logs out a User
     *
     * @param {String} token
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Result
     */
name: logoutUser

comment:
/**
     * Finds a token
     *  
     * @param {String} token
     *
     * @returns {Promise} User
     */
name: findToken

comment:
/**
     * Finds an invite token
     *  
     * @param {String} inviteToken
     *
     * @returns {Promise} User
     */
name: findInviteToken

comment:
/**
     * Removes a User
     *
     * @param {String} id
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Promise
     */
name: removeUser

comment:
/**
     * Removes a Project scope from a User object
     *
     * @param {String} id
     * @param {String} scope
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Promise
     */
description: Removes a Project scope from a User object
name: removeUserProjectScope

comment:
/**
     * Adds a Project scope to a User object
     *
     * @param {String} id
     * @param {String} project
     * @param {Array} scopes
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Promise
     */
description: Adds a Project scope to a User object
name: addUserProjectScope

comment:
/**
     * Activates an invited User
     *
     * @param {String} username
     * @param {String} password
     * @param {String} fullName
     * @param {String} inviteToken
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Login token
     */
name: activateUser

comment:
/**
     * Creates a User
     *
     * @param {String} username
     * @param {String} password
     * @param {Boolean} admin
     * @param {Object} scopes
     *
     * @returns {Promise} promise
     */
name: createUser

comment:
/**
     * Makes a User an admin
     *
     * @param {String} username
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Promise
     */
name: makeUserAdmin

comment:
/**
     * Gets a list of all users
     *
     * @param {String} project
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Array of User objects
     */
description: Gets a list of all users
name: getAllUsers

comment:
/**
     * Gets a single User by id
     *
     * @param {String} id
     *
     * @returns {Promise} User object
     */
description: Gets a single User by id
name: getUserById

comment:
/**
     * Gets a single User
     *
     * @param {String} username
     *
     * @returns {Promise} User object
     */
name: getUser

comment:
/**
     * Cleans up expired tokens
     *
     * @returns {Promise} promise
     */
name: cleanUpTokens

comment:
/**
     * Updates a User by id
     *
     * @param {String} id
     * @param {Object} properties
     *
     * @returns {Promise} Promise
     */
name: updateUserById

comment:
/**
     * Updates a User
     *
     * @param {String} username
     * @param {Object} properties
     *
     * @returns {Promise} promise
     */
name: updateUser
